author: Special Correspondent
text:
Condemning what they termed the discrepancies and degradation of quality in the Government Arts College for Men here and demanding action against those perpetrating the acts, college lecturers staged a sit in demonstration on Wednesday. The agitation was launched on Tuesday.

The agitators, belonging to the Tamil Nadu Government College Teachers’ Association, were led by Kumbakonam unit president Thangarasu and included secretary Swaminathan, treasurer Murugan while State general council members Ashokraj, Tamilvanan, Palanivel, Pitchai, Rangarajan and Varadarajan participated.

They demanded action to stem the slide and criticised the officials. They wanted the person responsible for the financial discrepancies transferred. Mr. Thangarasu claimed that the promise of the Regional Joint Director of Collegiate Education Umarani on their demands have not been met so far.
title: Lecturers stage demonstration
